debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose, to amend the Education Act 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

debates.showAs: Education (Inclusion of Persons) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Education Act 1998, and, for that purpose, to provide for the inclusion of information from special educational needs organisers in school planning; to provide for inclusion policies in schools and to provide recognised disabled persons organisations with a role in agreeing the composition of boards of management of a school; to amend the Education for Persons with Special Educational Needs Act 2004 to provide for enhanced planning and co-ordination in relation to school planning areas; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta Oideachais, 1998, agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faisnéis ó eagraithe um riachtanais speisialta oideachais a áireamh i bpleanáil scoile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le beartais uilechuimsitheachta i scoileanna agus do thabhairt ról d’eagraíochtaí aitheanta um dhaoine faoi mhíchumas maidir le comhdhéanamh bord bainistíochta scoile a chomhaontú; do leasú an Achta um Oideachas do Dhaoine a bhfuil Riachtanais Speisialta Oideachais Acu, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le pleanáil agus comhordú feabhsaithe i ndáil le limistéir pleanála scoile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose to amend the Education Act of 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

debates.showAs: Planning and Development Regulations (Amendment) (Solar Energy for Schools and Community Buildings) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for the installation of solar panels on school and community buildings without the need for planning permission, and for this purpose to amend S.I. No. 600 of 2001.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le grianphainéil a shuiteáil ar fhoirgnimh scoile agus phobail gan gá a bheith le cead pleanála agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú I.R. Uimh. 600 de 2001.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development Regulations (Amendment) (Solar Energy for Schools and Community Buildings) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá na Rialacháin um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Grianfhuinneamh le haghaidh Scoileanna agus Foirgnimh Phobail), 2022

debates.showAs: Local Government and Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Carrigaline Rent Pressure Zone) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Local Government and Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Carrigaline Rent Pressure Zone) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the entire Carrigaline local electoral area shall be prescribed as a rent pressure zone; to ensure that where a substantial area of a local electoral area is prescribed as a rent pressure zone, the local electoral area shall be prescribed as a rent pressure zone in its entirety; and for those purposes to amend the Local Government Act 2019 and the Residential Tenancies Act 2004.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfar toghlimistéar áitiúil Charraig Uí Leighin ina iomláine a fhorordú mar chrios brú cíosa; dá chinntiú, i gcás go bhforordófar limistéar substaintiúil de thoghlimistéar áitiúil mar chrios brú cíosa, go ndéanfar an toghlimistéar áitiúil ina iomláine a fhorordú mar chrios brú cíosa; agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2019 agus an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004.
bill.shortTitleEn: Local Government and Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Carrigaline Rent Pressure Zone) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialtas Áitiúil agus Tionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Crios Brú Cíosa Charraig Uí Leighin), 2022

debates.showAs: Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Education Act 1998 to grant additional functions to the Inspectorate to examine and report to the Minister on the prevalence and standard of individual educational plans for children with special educational needs on an annual basis; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998 chun feidhmeanna breise a thabhairt don Chigireacht maidir le scrúdú a dhéanamh ar leathadúlacht agus caighdeán pleananna oideachais aonair le haghaidh leanaí a bhfuil riachtanais oideachais speisialta acu agus tuairisciú a dhéanamh ar an gcéanna don Aire ar bhonn bliantúil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Iniúchadh ar Phleananna Oideachais Aonair le haghaidh Leanaí a bhfuil Riachtanais Speisialta acu), 2022

debates.showAs: Education (Voluntary Contributions) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Education (Voluntary Contributions) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Voluntary Contributions) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the collection by schools of voluntary contributions from parents/guardians; to provide for the publication of the total monies collected annually and a detailed expenditure of those monies by schools; and for those purposes to amend the Education Act 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar scoileanna do bhailiú ranníocaí saorálacha ó thuismitheoirí / ó chaomhnóirí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an airgead go léir a bhaileofar gach bliain agus le caiteachas mionsonraithe an airgid sin ag scoileanna a fhoilsiú; agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.

debates.showAs: Sexual Offences (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Criminal Law (Rape) Act 1981 (as amended) to enable complainants to be heard and legally represented in relation to applications to adduce evidence about the clothing worn by a complainant at the time of the alleged offence; to amend the provisions in respect of previous sexual history evidence and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Banéigean), 1981 (arna leasú) chun a chumasú gearánaigh a éisteacht agus ionadaíocht dhlíthiúil a bheith acu i ndáil le hiarratais ar fhianaise a thabhairt ar aird maidir leis na héadaí arna gcaitheamh ag an ngearánach tráth an chiona líomhnaithe; do leasú na bhforálacha i leith fianaise ar stair ghnéasach roimhe sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Taisceadán (Valuable Property Register) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Taisceadán (Valuable Property Register) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of Taisceadán, a Register of items of personal property to be managed by An Garda Síochána to assist in the identification of items of personal property, for the purposes of investigation of crime, for the repatriation of items of property and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Taisceadán a bhunú, arb éard a bheidh ann Clár d’ítimí maoine pearsanta ar a ndéanfaidh an Garda Síochána bainistiú chun cuidiú a thabhairt maidir le hítimí maoine pearsanta a shainaithint, d’fhonn coireacht a imscrúdú agus d'fhonn ítimí maoine a athdhúichiú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Regulation of Private Security Firms Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Regulation of Private Security Firms Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Private Security Services Act 2004 to regulate private security companies engaged in the enforcement of court orders including the repossession of properties and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Slándála Príobháidí, 2004 chun rialáil a dhéanamh ar chuideachtaí slándála príobháidí atá ag gabháil d’fhorfheidhmiú orduithe cúirte, lena n-áirítear maoine a athshealbhú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Regulation of Private Security Firms Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghnólachtaí Slándála Príobháidí a Rialáil, 2019

debates.showAs: Údarás na Gaeltachta (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for democratic elections to Údarás na Gaeltachta and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toghcháin dhaonlathacha 
chun Údarás na Gaeltachta agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás na Gaeltachta (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Digital Safety Commissioner Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Digital Safety Commissioner Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Digital Safety Commissioner Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish an office of a Digital Safety Commissioner and to provide for its functions to ensure the oversight and regulation of procedures for removal, by digital service undertakings, of harmful digital communications; to provide for the creation of codes of practice for digital services undertakings; to establish an advisory committee to the Digital Safety Commissioner and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú oifig Coimisinéara um Shábháilteacht Dhigiteach agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir lena feidhmeanna chun a chinntiú go ndéanfar formhaoirsiú agus rialáil ar nósanna imeachta maidir le gnóthais seirbhíse digití do dhíchur cumarsáid dhigiteach dhochrach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cóid chleachtais a chruthú le haghaidh gnóthais seirbhíse digití; do bhunú coiste comhairleach don Choimisinéir um Shábháilteacht Dhigiteach agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Choimisinéir um Shábháilteacht Dhigiteach, 2017

debates.showAs: Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for certain procedural and other changes in civil actions so as to provide for the bringing of Multi-Party Actions; to reduce the cost of litigation; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe ar an nós imeachta agus le hathruithe áirithe eile i gcaingne sibhialta d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Caingne Ilpháirtí a thionscnamh; do laghdú an chostais a bhaineann le dlíthíocht; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: Céim an Choiste

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016
